channel.title: Trafficwatch NI Incidents
channel.description: A listing of incidents in Northern Ireland.

item.title: Belfast: Signals OFF Ormeau Rd / Cromac St / Ormeau Av, , Ormeau Avenue, Belfast
item.description: In Belfast: the traffic Signals Ormeau Road at the junction with Cromac Street and Ormeau Avenue are currently all OUT Road users are asked to approach this junction with extra care and be prepared to STOP/Give Way until we can get this issue fixed.

item.title: Derry / Londonderry: Foyle Bridge re-opened, A515, Madam's Bank Road, Londonderry
item.description: In Derry / Londonderry: Foyle Bridge is closed between Caw Roundabout and Culmore Road Roundabout for emergency road works.

item.title: Belfast - College Green Closed, , College Green, Belfast
Ballymena: Cullybackey Road is CLOSED, , Cullybackey Road , Ballymena
item.description: In Ballymena: Road usersare advised that the Cullybackey Road is CLOSED in both directions following a road traffic collision. Diversions are in place at the junction with Woodstown Road and the junction with Inishowen Park, please seek alternate routes for your journey.
